name: SPIRALUX
description:
A series of Twine games I made during 2018 under a different moniker

Each captures the essence of my lived experiences, mostly involving my school, hence the name of three games called SchoolQuest. The 3 SchoolQuest games were made at school in a single day each. What's Up was made in a day at home, and Null Manifesto was the pioneering zine, and took several months to complete for personal reasons obvious in the game. 

I've moved on from making games like this and have slowly been working on much different games. I frame these games as parts of a whole experience and mindset, and would like to see them as one cohesive compilation.

These games can be very disjointed, incoherent, or upsetting, but are mostly short and benign.
